JobFullDesc:
WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR? 
Our Global Technology Audit team brings its extensive experience and passion for technology to bear on helping NIKE handle the many risks and opportunities associated with a large, global technology ecosystem and an accelerating digital business. As one of our Audit Managers, you will use strong audit craft, teamwork, and adept interpersonal skills to bring valuable insights to help management effectively handle risk while NIKE best leverages technology for strategic advantage. You'll join a dynamic Global Risk Management team where collaboration and innovation are celebrated! We are a group of continuous learners and creative problem solvers who love to challenge the status quo every day!
WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON? 
NIKE’s technology landscape is constantly evolving, but some audit areas of focus may include, cloud platforms, DevOps CI/CD processes, technical operations, site reliability engineering, digital experience development, product management, technology governance, portfolio management, data governance, data privacy, cybersecurity, enterprise system implementation reviews (e.g. SAP), enterprise architecture, business continuity management/disaster recovery, and assessing technology risk in other emerging applications/subject areas such as AI/ML, blockchain, and RPA.
You'll independently plan and execute scope areas on complex audits, provide creative and strategic business recommendations, and deliver executive-level verbal and written communications to a variety of business partners across the company. You'll also provide pragmatic advice to management in order to improve risk management capabilities and evaluate emerging risks to technology planning and operations. 
WHO WILL YOU WORK WITH? 
In this role, you will be given the opportunity to learn about a wide range of NIKE’s business and how technology is critical to bringing innovation and inspiration to every athlete* in the world. You will work in a team of audit and risk professionals, and together build partnerships with our business partners across Global Technology, Privacy, and Security to deliver impactful engagements that are highly visible to NIKE executive management and the Board of Directors Audit & Finance Committee.
